welcome_message_body: Welcome to Upper Darby! Prepare to be charmed by our vibrant community, rich history, and diverse culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all commercial flights and provides various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves all commercial and general aviation flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport is for private and chartered flights only.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport is available for use by private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
